parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID.

> You can call the [DescribeDBInstances](~~86911~~) operation to query the IDs of all AnalyticDB for PostgreSQL instances within a region.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC. The end time must be later than the start time.

parameters.name: Key
parameters.description: The performance metric. Separate multiple values with commas (,). For more information, see [Performance parameters](~~86943~~).

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: This parameter is no longer used.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the ISO 8601 standard in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
